source(file = "../R/wrangle.R")
# Import and wrangle data
bike_day <- read.csv("../data/bike-day.csv", header = T)
# Use the wrangling "wrapper" function to clean the data (fxn sourced from wrangle.R)
data <- wrangle_init(bike_day)
